Help:Node.title: Command Usage: !infoline
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: !infoline [option]
EXAMPLE: !infoline on ; !infoline off
Turning infoline on tells you the user and character names of every one who logs on, as they do. Turning infoline offs ceases your receipt of this information.
SEE ALSO: !customers, !hotspots, !people
